titleInfo.title: All Night Singing at Home Mission Church (18093)

mods.abstract: One color window card (red on brown) announcing All Night Singing featuring Little Fields, the Parables, Servants Quartet, Gospel Twins, and the Spiritual Four at Home Mission Church on September 18. To see the business record associated with this poster, visit https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/48494/

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
